pluginstrument.author: Sim Innovations
pluginstrument.description: TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO - Finish radio altimeter functionality (flashing etc...). - Make thousands on altitude tape bigger than hundreds. - Make heading bug stop at the corners of the compass rose. - Implement autopilot modes. - Ground indicator should show landing altitude from 400nm to destination. - Flashing and color change of BARO and RADIO minimums indicators. - Various maneuvering speeds (waiting for good datarefs). TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO TO DO
